product_name: Brooks Essential Run Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Soon to be your new favorite, the Brooks Essential Run Shorts pack a list of features that pair well with a good run like a just-right 5 in. inseam length and a secure zippered pocket. Woven polyester exterior has moisture-wicking mesh insets; soft polyester liner moves moisture away from skin to ensure dry comfort. Elastic waistband with drawstring fine-tunes the fit. Stash your house key in the internal pocket; invisible zippered back pocket provides additional storage. 360deg of reflectivity make you visible to oncoming motorists at night. Closeout.
short_description: Soon to be your new favorite, the Brooks Essential Run Shorts pack a list of features that pair well with a good run like a just-right 5 in. inseam length and a secure zippered pocket.
